[[File:VI.jpg|left|vignette|666x666px|Paralysis of the right VI: abolition of abduction of the right eye]]

properties.question: In a patient with right VI paralysis, what is the expected effect on eye movement when looking to the left?
properties.option_a: The right eye will exhibit normal abduction.
properties.option_b: The right eye will show limited adduction.
properties.option_c: The left eye will exhibit normal adduction.
properties.option_d: The patient will experience diplopia due to the inability of the right eye to move laterally.
